attributes.review: Horrendous representation of the color orange, Chester the cheetah would be deeply offended.🧡 The app it’s self was wayyyyy below apple standards but the worst thing by far was the joke of a “president” the app is trying to help. Gen Z is stronger than anything you “Trump 2020” people think you have. Could never find a reason to support🥰 have fun this November! BLM and ABOLISH ICE, thank you very much and hope this app goes before tiktok does!💖
attributes.title: 💖✨🧚worst thing to ever happen😻🧚‍♀️✨not just talking about the app

attributes.review: First off, the app literally shows pictures of an actual racist and rapist everywhere which is kind of sick and disgusting. He’s not something I want to see because he’s orange and that’s my least favorite color. Speaking of colors, I don’t like the red white and blue theme it reminds me of America which is racist and corrupt. Also, the app is meaningless and useless so I hope it gets taken down soon. Anyways chile I’m goin to the store, y’all want sum😳
attributes.title: Terrible🤢

attributes.review:
✨The quality is horrible. It lags like crazy. Most importantly it supports Donald. How could you support someone who is such a bad leader, has such little regard for the common good of others and not just himself. I find it QUITE DISGUSTING to call this man the president. THEREFORE to put the people of the U.S first its best to go ahead and take this trash quality app down while there is still time. Gen Z just won’t stand for it please and thanks!!! ✨

attributes.title: Flat out terrible

attributes.review: After downloading this app right after I tried opening it my entire phone started glitching and the screen froze every 2 seconds and eventually stopped working!!!! I had to take my phone to the Verizon store and they told me that the trump 2020 app had downloaded a virus into my phone and there was nothing they could do !!!!!!! I’m writing this on my new phone that I had to pay 1200 for thanks a lot trump 🤮
attributes.title: 🚨THIS APP IS A VIRUS🚨

attributes.review: My 6 year old daughter downloaded this app thinking it was a game. After she opened it she came crying screaming “THE ORANGE MAN IS GONNA GET ME!” She would not stop crying. When i went to see the app myself the first thing i saw when opening it was a horrible man trying to do a downward dog workout but he was not flexible enough! it sickened me thinking this was in the children category of the appstore. Horrible. Do Not Get. My daughter still has nightmares of him.
attributes.title: Horrible🙃

attributes.review: A couple of weeks ago, me (a 78 year old women paralyzed from the neck down) was wheeling around Maryland when I came across The Donald J Trump! 🤮 I tried saying hello because I wanted him to take a picture with me so I could get Instagram clout, he looked me up and down and said “only if you stand up for the picture” then proceeded to spit in my eye!!!! Now I have conjunctivitis!!!!!! 🤮😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 1 STAR!!!!!!!! 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: I was spit on!!! 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: First thing on the opening page of the app was a picture of our president with his little pecker hanging out, I at first didn’t notice it due to it’s unusually small stature, but once I took a closer look, it was obviously a micropenis belonging to our president, Donald J. Trump. I am disgusted to see this childlike and sick behavior to be done by of the leader of our country. I still quite don’t understand the motive behind it, he could just be a sick twisted person.
attributes.title: Mortified

attributes.review:
I got this app on my 9 year old daughter’s iPad and when she opened it she immediately started crying. I wanted to know what was so wrong so I looked on the screen and it was our president, of the united states of america, naked and asking MY DAUGHTER so send nudes to his campaign email. I am absolutely disgusted by what I saw and what my daughter had to see. If you get this app I highly recommend not opening it ANYWHERE around your children.

sincerely, Lisa Car
attributes.title: I am disgusted

attributes.review: Pedophine, racist, idiot, rapist, and literally retarded. Also when I downloaded it I tried to delete it and it wouldn’t delete so I left it there and when I opened my phone it told me it was trying to track my location even though i denied access. I left my phone to charge and when i came back my phone was crawling with cockroaches. 0/5 would never use again, finally got it deleted!
